# Salvage Specialist SOP This is the list of procedures, responsibilities, and duties of the [color=#846326]Salvage Specialist[/color] of this station.
1. Salvage Specialists are to ensure adequate material supply for the station and its operations.
2. Salvage Specialists are bound by the same laws as [color=#846326]Cargo Technician[/color]s when doing any Cargo work.
3. Salvage Specialists should return any contraband found on lavaland to the Security Department immediately upon returning to the station.
4. Salvage Specialists are not permitted to use any weapons found on lavaland except for personal defense while mining. A permit is required when returning to the station to allow further use of the weaponry. It should be approved by Captain, Head of Security, and/or Warden [bold]and[/bold] the Quartermaster.
